mapper.insert: insert into sportzplatform.tournament_player_registration (registration_refid, seeding, tournament_category_refid, tournament_refid, group_refid) values (#{registrationRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seeding,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tournamentCategoryRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tournamentRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sportzplatform.tournament_player_registration set registration_refid = #{registrationRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seeding = #{seeding,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tournament_category_refid = #{tournamentCategoryRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tournament_refid = #{tournamentRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_refid = #{groupRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tour_player_reg_id = #{tourPlayerRegId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tour_player_reg_id, registration_refid, seeding, tournament_category_refid, tournament_refid, group_refid from sportzplatform.tournament_player_registration where tour_player_reg_id = #{tourPlayerRegId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
